original_title: More details of Ragama shooting incident revealed
original_body_lines: Three people have sustained injuries in a shooting incident that took place last night (Dec.14) in Walpola, Ragama.
According to the police, an unidentified gunman, who is believed to have arrived on a motorcycle, had barged into a house in Walpola and opened fire.
The three injured, including a 17-year-old boy and a woman, have been admitted to the Ragama Hospital for immediate medical attention.
